name: MohBad
description: '''Ilerioluwa Oladimeji Aloba''' (3 January 1996 â€“ 12 September 2023), known professionally as '''MohBad''', was a [[Nigerians|Nigerian]] rapper, singer, and songwriter from Lagos. Mohbad was formerly signed to [[Naira Marley]]'s Marlian Records and left the label in 2022. He was best known for his hit songs "Ponmo," "[[Peace (MohBad song)|Peace]]," "Beast and Peace," "Sorry", "Feel Good," and "KPK (Ko Por Ke)" (You Will Always Be Remembered) with [[Rexxie]], which was nominated three times for [[The Headies]] awards 2022. On 18 September 2023, he ranked number 1 on ''[[TurnTable]]''<nowiki/>'s [[TurnTable charts#Main|Official Artiste Top 100]].
